title: Bunker Jumper
summary: Game Builder Club - Top down action to survive for as a long as possible in the apocolypse.
description: After two semesters of team leading, I decided to step back for a time due to school commitments. With a more dedicated team that semester, we managed to realize nearly 100% of the original vision. As lead programmer, I focused on keeping the project’s structure clean and guided Aidan through his first experience leading a team. I also experimented with advanced programming patterns, including multiple concurrent state machines for the player system. The result was one of the best games I’ve ever worked on.
